game.name: The Amazing American Circus
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roll up and play a deck building game like no other! Gather weird and wonderful performers, amaze audiences, explore Gilded Age America, and transform your run down circus into an entertainment empire. Play your cards right and you could claim the crown of greatest showman from P.T .Barnum!
